revised_title: Safranine: A Red Tar-Pigment Derived from Aromatic Azodiamines
tldr: The authors investigate the properties and synthesis of safranine, a red tar-pigment derived from aromatic azodiamines. They analyze various salts of safranine, including chlorhydrate, platinum salt, nitrate, picrate, bromhydrate, iodhydrate, sulfate, and oxalate, and describe their properties and reactions.
